analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xa5f1dbb0e55bc31f32c6d032bee330288490e722.sol:
	Contract DayByDayToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xa5f1dbb0e55bc31f32c6d032bee330288490e722.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xa5f1dbb0e55bc31f32c6d032bee330288490e722.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0xa5f1dbb0e55bc31f32c6d032bee330288490e722.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0xa5f1dbb0e55bc31f32c6d032bee330288490e722.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
